data.name: Halloween Night Demo
data.detailed_description:
26-year-old Henry is at friend's halloween party. At 11pm they sit down at the table and tell each other terrible stories. Henry begins to tell a terrifying story from his life when he was just a little boy...

You play the role of little Henry and experience the terror that befell him 20 years earlier on Halloween. The DEMO consists 1 of 4 chapters, each of them is a separate day in the life of a 6-year-old Henry and includes separate game mechanics.

You are in your childhood home 20 years earlier. Your job is to stay alive and keep the Devil, who wants your soul, away from you. It will not be easy, because the Devil is getting more and more angry and dangerous every day. Surviving each day will be a challenge.

Will you be up to the task?
Will you send the devil back to where he came from?
Will you end the game with a Good or Bad Ending?

It Depends On You.

data.short_description: You play the role of Henry as a child and experience the terror that befell him 20 years earlier on Halloween. The DEMO consists 1 of 4 chapters, each of them is a separate day in the life of a 6-year-old henry. Will you end the game with a Good or Bad Ending? It Depends On You.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, Vista, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, Vista, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
